workshoptitle: Analyze data at scale in object storage with MySQL HeatWave Lakehouse

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies. The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create Compartment, VCN and MySQL HeatWave DB System while loading DB Data
Lab 2: Create Compute with MySQL Shell
Lab 3: Upload data to Object Storage for HeatWave Lakehouse
Lab 4: Add HeatWave Cluster to the DB sytem
Lab 5: Create Oracle Analytics Cloud Instance
Lab 6: Load data into HeatWave Cluster
Lab 7: Load CSV data from OCI Object Store
Lab 8: Load Parquet format data directly from Object Store
Lab 9: Create datasets in Oracle Analytics Cloud
Lab 10: Build a real-time dashboard in Oracle Analytics Cloud with MySQL HeatWave
Lab 11: Develop MySQL HeatWave and Lakehouse Apps with LAMP
Lab 12: (Bonus)  Develop MySQL HeatWave Apps with Oracle APEX
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
